4.11.20  1:54 am   12.9.19 4:59 pm    4.9.20 12:08 pm    I think I've figured out a way to loop videos on Chrome so you can have your vine page on this site. Ctrl + click (Mac) or right-click (Windows) the video and a menu should pop up. Select "Loop," and the video will start from the beginning once it reaches its end. Will you take my advice and start working on that vine page?

4.11.20  12:50 am   I really have to thank you Bill. I know you're likely going to answer this with some sort of "holy fishpaste the magnitude of friendliness is overwhelming" and that's great I really like those answers and how they're always different but I hope you do read this and understand the sincerity of my thanks. I have always felt like there was this slight pretentiousness living inside me about the music that I like. Like if it didn't have extended harmony or weird changes or complicated rhythms it was stupid, but only SOMEWHAT. And I never really liked this about myself but it always felt true and I had a hard time liking other, lets just say more popular sounding music. But listening to your music has made a huge change within me. Like I would never have been into a song like New Canaan even a year ago but now here I am hearing the music and enjoying it and experiencing it like how music should be experienced! And I just feel so much more open to the worl d when i t comes to writing my songs and all the opportunities that are out there. I think I'm really just enjoying music the most I ever have right now, and I owe it all to you. It definitely has an impact on how I view the world as well. Everything seems better. So thank you Bill!!!
